statements.update: INSERT INTO HNS_病人护理计划(ID,标准计划ID,部门ID,对象ID,修改用户,修改时间) VALUES (#ID#,#PlanStandardID#,#DeptID#,#ObjectID#,#ModifyUser#,#ModifyTime#)

update HNS_病人护理计划 set
标准计划ID=#PlanStandardID# 部门ID=#DeptID# 对象ID=#ObjectID# 修改用户=#ModifyUser# 修改时间=#ModifyTime#
where ID=#ID#
statements.delete: delete from HNS_病人护理计划 where ID=#ID#
statements.select: SELECT * FROM HNS_病人护理计划 WHERE ID=#ID#

select * from HNS_病人护理计划
ID=#ID# 标准计划ID like '%$PlanStandardID$%' 部门ID like '%$DeptID$%' 对象ID like '%$ObjectID$%' 修改用户 like '%$ModifyUser$%' 修改时间 > to_date(#StartDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 修改时间 < to_date(#EndDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 修改时间 like '%$ModifyTime$%'
$ORDER_BY_CLAUSE$

SELECT count(*) FROM HNS_病人护理计划
ID=#ID# 标准计划ID like '%$PlanStandardID$%' 部门ID like '%$DeptID$%' 对象ID like '%$ObjectID$%' 修改用户 like '%$ModifyUser$%' 修改时间 > to_date(#StartDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 修改时间 < to_date(#EndDate#,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') 修改时间 like '%$ModifyTime$%'
$ORDER_BY_CLAUSE$

SELECT b.Id As "SchemeID",c.名称 As "Name",a.修改用户 As "CreatedUser", To_Char(a.修改时间, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') As "CreatedTime", (select count(1) from HNS_病人护理签名 where 源ID=b.id and 是否作废=0) As "SignedCount" FROM HNS_病人护理计划 a,HNS_病人护理计划方案 b,hns_护理问题 c where a.ID=b.病人计划ID and b.问题ID = c.ID and a.对象ID=#PatientID# and b.是否作废=0

SELECT mx.代码 "Code",mx.内容 "TargetContent",mx.选项ID "TargetID",fa.类型 "QuestionType", pg.ID "EvaluateID",pg.评估人 "Evaluater",To_Char(pg.评估时间, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') "EvaluateTime",pg.评估理由 "EvaluateContent", pg.状态 "EvaluateStatus",pg.签名ID "EvaluateSignID", qm.ID "SignID",qm.性质 "SignStatus",qm.签名人 "Signer",To_Char(qm.签名时间, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') "SignedTime" FROM hns_病人护理计划方案 fa left join HNS_病人护理计划方案明细 mx on fa.id = mx.方案ID left join (select * from ( select * from hns_病人护理评估 where 计划方案ID =#SchemeID# order by 评估时间 desc) where rownum =1) pg on fa.id = pg.计划方案ID left join HNS_病人护理签名 qm on qm.源ID=fa.ID AND qm.是否作废=0 where fa.id = #SchemeID# AND fa.是否作废=0
select c.ID "QuestionID",c.名称 "QuestionName",c.类别 "QuestionType" from hns_病人护理计划 a left join hns_病人护理计划方案 b on a.id=b.病人计划ID inner join hns_护理问题 c on b.问题ID=c.ID where a.对象ID = #PatientID#
